summary: The intense, realistic and unflinching tale of Maria, Allan and Steso, who are struggling for survival in urban life, about drugs.
cast: Signe Egholm Olsen|Claus Riis Østergaard|Thure Lindhardt|Farshad Kholghi|Thomas L. Corneliussen|Pernille Vallentin|Signe Vaupel|Rudi Køhnke|Maria Stenz|Finn Storgaard|Lars Mikkelsen|Søs Egelind|Stanislav Sevcik|Nils P. Munk|Paw Henriksen|Kirsten Norholt|Priscilla Rasmussen|Barbara Hesselager|Ulver Skuli Abildgaard|Benjamin Boe Rasmussen|Stephanie Fiomo|Joachim Malling|Mehrdad Zamani|Nanna Berg|Klaus Hyr Hansen|Mark Hoppe|Anders Kristensen|Rasmus Møller Lauritsen|Jesper Aagaard Placing
title: Nordkraft
